headline: Norwegian Cruise Line (NCLH) Valuation After Strategy Shift Toward Short Caribbean Sailings and Strong Q3 Bookings
summary: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings (NCLH) saw its shares edge higher after management outlined a refreshed strategy focused on more short Caribbean sailings for premium families, supported by third quarter bookings rising over 20% year over year. See our latest analysis for Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings. The upbeat reaction to Norwegian Cruise Line’s refreshed strategy sits against a tougher backdrop, with the share price at $18.92 and a 90 day share price return of negative 26.27% contrasting...
